member.name: IClassActivator.GetClassObject
member.param: The CLSID that identifies the class whose class object is to be retrieved.
The context in which the class is expected to run. For a list of values, see the enumeration.
An LCID constant as defined in WinNls.h.
The IID of the interface on the object to which a pointer is desired.
The address of pointer variable that receives the interface pointer requested in riid. Upon successful return, *ppv contains the requested interface pointer.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_FAIL.

member.name: IClassActivator
member.summary: Specifies a method that retrieves a class object.
